XTB is a publicly-traded broker listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange, offering access to over 6,100 instruments including stocks, forex, indices, and commodities. Their proprietary xStation 5 platform is highly intuitive and packed with advanced trading tools.

Pros & Cons

Pros

  • Commission-free stock trading
  • Excellent educational resources
  • Award-winning xStation platform
  • Over 6,100 instruments

Cons

  • Higher spreads on forex
  • Limited crypto selection

PlatformsxStation 5, MetaTrader 4
EUR/USD Spread0.8 pips

Fees & Spreads

EUR/USD Spread: 0.8 pips

Commission: 0% on stocks

XTB offers competitive pricing suitable for both beginners and professional traders.

Our Verdict

XTB is perfect for traders interested in stock trading with zero commissions. Their educational resources are among the best in the industry, making them ideal for beginners. However, forex traders might find better spreads elsewhere.
